critique: The document discusses internal revenue rules and temporary appointments. The tone is formal and bureaucratic. The primary goal seems to be to ensure the smooth functioning of the internal revenue service during emergencies and vacancies. There's no strong indication of intended emotions. The language is neutral and focuses on procedures and limitations. Therefore, most emotions should be scored low. There might be a slight sense of reassurance (low joy) due to the measures taken to address emergencies. There might be a slight sense of fear that the rules are not followed, so I will give it a 2. There is no indication of disgust. There might be a slight sense of surprise that the rules are being changed, so I will give it a 2. There is no indication of sadness.
